summary:
Yesterday, I launched the July Reply blog challenge.  I like the idea and hoped there would be a lot of interest, but so far, it's been lukewarm. 
For the past few weeks, I have posted something new every day...
title: Equally different

summary: Apple has long been posterizing that they care about diversity and the environment, but their actions have never backed it up.  They might put up a black and white photo of Ghandi with some clich√©d text next to it, but it has only ever been about The Brand.  This article from 404 Media gets in to the latest news about Apple's violations, but this isn't the first time we've heard about this...
title: California Apple Manufacturing Facility Has 19 'Potential Violations' of EPA Regulations

summary:
Interesting paper about a German cryptanalysis machine that helped break the US M-209 mechanical ciphering machine. 
The paper contains a good description of how the M-209 works.
title: Breaking the M-209

summary: Reflections on the learning experience of helping a student with code and realizing the value of practice
title: How Far We've Come
